purpleculture_pinyin:
chǎn
to express; to disclose; to enlighten; to open
выражать; раскрывать; просветить; открыть
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 阐)
Pictophonetic: 單 indicates the sound; 門 (gate) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
闡述 [ chǎn shù ]: to expound (a position); to elaborate (on a topic); to treat (a subject)
闡明 [ chǎn míng ]: to elucidate; to explain clearly; to expound
闡釋 [ chǎn shì ]: to explain; to expound; to interpret; elucidation
闡發 [ chǎn fā ]: to elucidate; to expound; to study and explain
闡揚 [ chǎn yáng ]: to expound; to propagate
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿵ Surround from above
    • 門 [ mén ] gate, door, entrance, opening
    • 單 [ dān ] single, individual, only; lone
heisig_chinese_memo: The police get ahold of the mafia's meeting attendees list by taking pictures of them walking through the mansion gates.  They try to explicate (analyze to discover meaning) the list to bring down their operations.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: At water gate the lawyers had a long list of questions which they used to dig deep and explicate the problem.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " door " to " single " sound, the original meaning is to open up. "Shuowen": "Open Ye. Congmen, single tone. "Yi" says: Explain the quiet." "Historical Records-Qin Shihuang Benji": "Explain and conquer the world, the evil will be extinct, and the army will be forever."

" Interpretation " can mean revealing. "Lu's Spring and Autumn-Decisive Victory": "Hidden wins over interpretation, while slight wins over show."

" Interpretation " can also mean open. "Wen Xuan-Ban Gu "East Capital Fu": "So the holy emperor holds Qian's talisman and interprets Kunzhen." Lu Yanji's note: "Explain, open also."

" Explanation " can also mean elucidation and clarification. The Southern Dynasties Liang Liu Xie's "Wen Xin Diao Long-Shen Si": "The most refined, then the explanation, the most change, then the count."
humanum_short_description_en: From " door " to " single " sound, the original meaning is to open up.
humanum_full_description:
從「門」，「單」聲，本義為開闢。《說文》：「開也。从門，單聲。《易》曰：闡幽。」《史記‧秦始皇本紀》：「闡并天下，甾害絕息，永偃戎兵。」

　　「闡」可表示顯露。《呂氏春秋‧決勝》：「隱則勝闡矣，微則勝顯矣。」

　　「闡」也可表示打開。《文選‧班固〈東都賦〉》：「於是聖皇乃握乾符，闡坤珍。」呂延濟注：「闡，開也。」

　　「闡」還可表示闡發、闡明。南朝梁劉勰《文心雕龍‧神思》：「至精而後闡其妙，至變而後通其數。」

Pinyin: chǎn
English Definition: to express; to disclose; to enlighten; to open
Total strokes: 20; Radical: 門
Pictophonetic: 單 indicates the sound; 門 (gate) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿵ Surround from above
    • 門 [ mén ] gate, door, entrance, opening
    • 單 [ dān ] single, individual, only; lone

闡明 [ chǎn míng ]: to elucidate; to explain clearly; to expound
闡釋 [ chǎn shì ]: to explain; to expound; to interpret; elucidation
闡發 [ chǎn fā ]: to elucidate; to expound; to study and explain
闡揚 [ chǎn yáng ]: to expound; to propagate

從「 門 」，「 單 」聲，本義為開闢。《說文》：「開也。从門，單聲。《易》曰：闡幽。」《史記‧秦始皇本紀》：「闡并天下，甾害絕息，永偃戎兵。」 「 闡 」可表示顯露。《呂氏春秋‧決勝》：「隱則勝闡矣，微則勝顯矣。」 「 闡 」也可表示打開。《文選‧班固〈東都賦〉》：「於是聖皇乃握乾符，闡坤珍。」呂延濟注：「闡，開也。」 「 闡 」還可表示闡發、闡明。南朝梁劉勰《文心雕龍‧神思》：「至精而後闡其妙，至變而後通其數。」
From " door" to " single" sound, the original meaning is to open up. "Shuowen": "Open Ye. Congmen, single tone. "Yi" says: Explain the quiet." "Historical Records-Qin Shihuang Benji": "Explain and conquer the world, the evil will be extinct, and the army will be forever." " Interpretation" can mean revealing. "Lu's Spring and Autumn-Decisive Victory": "Hidden wins over interpretation, while slight wins over show." " Interpretation" can also mean open. "Wen Xuan-Ban Gu "East Capital Fu": "So the holy emperor holds Qian's talisman and interprets Kunzhen." Lu Yanji's note: "Explain, open also." " Explanation" can also mean elucidation and clarification. The Southern Dynasties Liang Liu Xie's "Wen Xin Diao Long-Shen Si": "The most refined, then the explanation, the most change, then the count."

闡字的基本解释

闡
chǎn
见“阐”。

闡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chǎn］
［《廣韻》昌善切，上獮，昌。］
“阐1”的繁体字。亦作“閳1”。
(1)开辟；扩大。
(2)显露。
(3)打开。
(4)阐发，阐明。
(5)通“繟”。舒缓。
(6)古邑名。春秋鲁地。在今山东宁阳西北。

闡字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【門字部】　闡； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1342第05
【唐韻】昌善切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】齒善切，?音幝。【說文】開也。【增韻】闢也。【後漢·班固傳】厥有氏號，紹天闡繹者。【註】闡，開也。　又【增韻】顯也。【玉篇】明也。【易·繫辭】夫易彰往而察來，而微顯闡幽。【註】闡，明也。【書·大禹謨·舞干羽于兩階傳】修闡文敎，舞文舞于賓主階閒。【春秋·左傳杜序】其微顯闡幽，裁成義類者，皆據舊例而發義，指行事以正褒貶。【揚子·太?經】次六：幽闡積。【註】六爲水稱。幽施祿及下，故闡積。　又【玉篇】大也。【易·豐卦註】闡者，弘廣之言。凡物之大，具有二種，一者自然之大，一者由人之闡弘使大。【書·君?·爾惟弘周公丕訓傳】汝爲政，當闡大周公之大訓。　又廣也。【史記·秦始皇紀】闡幷天下。又【禪梁父註】禪闡廣地土也。　又地名。【左傳·哀八年】夏齊人取讙及闡。【註】闡在東平劉縣北。【後漢·郡國志】益州越巂郡闡。　又【集韻】稱延切，音燀。【陸雲·陸府君誄】瑰光旣耀，靈寶未闡，弗慮皇圖，銜恨殂遷。　又【韻補】叶稱人切，音瞋。【?

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chǎn］
["Guangyun" Chang Shan cuts, up and down, Chang. ]
The traditional characters of "Zhan 1". Also known as "閳1".
(1) Opening up; expanding.
(2) Revealed.
(3) Open.
(4) Interpretation and clarification.
(5) Through "繟". Soothing.
(6) The name of the ancient town. Spring and Autumn Lu land. In today's northwest of Ningyang, Shandong.
